solution_line_template: First find how many hours Carla has to work: {end_time}:00 - {start_time}:00 = {hours_to_work} hours

Then divide the total amount of laundry by the number of hours to find how many pieces Carla has to clean per hour: {total_laundry_pieces} pieces / {hours_to_work} hours = <<{total_laundry_pieces}/{hours_to_work}={pieces_per_hour}>>{pieces_per_hour} pieces/hour
